pullRequest.title: [Bug] Fix bug of load error hub and schema change
pullRequest.bodyText:
Proposed changes


When WITH_MYSQL is off, load error hub does not suport MySQL load error hub,
we should check its return value. (introduced by #4371 )


misjudge the return value of change_row_block in schema_change.cpp (Introduced by #4388 )


Types of changes

 Bugfix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

commit.message:
[Bug] Fix bug of load error hub and schema change

1. When WITH_MYSQL is off, load error hub does not suport MySQL load error hub,
   we should check its return value.

2. misjudge the return value of `change_row_block` in schema_change.cpp

nodes.bodyText: It is better not to assign values in if statements
